message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $135, which is a great price considering its worth to me. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you taking the time to reach out. I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $120.  I'd be willing to buy it at that price if it works for you.
Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to get at least $125 to make this work.  Let me know if you're interested in that.
